events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
The application for the Software Engineer role has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on the provided skills and experience.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your case to guide you through the recruitment process and answer any queries you might have.
We conducted an initial screening of your application and qualifications. Your background aligns well with our requirements for the Software Engineer position.
Thank you for promptly providing additional information and confirming your availability for the upcoming interview rounds.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the Software Engineer position on 2024-04-22 at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
